titleStmt.title: Marchants water-works. King Willam and Queen Mary, by their letter patents, bearing date the eighth day of March in the sixth year of their reign; did grant to Craven Howard and John Harington, Gent deceased: and to Hugh Marchant and Huntley Bigg, Gent. for the term of ninety nine years, ...
titleStmt.author: Marchant, Hugh.
